com.kuka.threading

Class ThreadGroupUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.threading.ThreadGroupUtil

  • public final class ThreadGroupUtil
extends Object
    Utility class providing methods to work with special thread group features.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> T getGroupLocal(Class<T> clazz)
      Deprecated. 
      This functionality has moved to TaskContext.
      static <G> G tryFindThreadGroupOfType(Class<G> groupClass)
      Searches the thread group hierarchy upward for the thread group of the specified type starting from the thread group of the calling thread.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroupLocal

        @Deprecated
public static <T> T getGroupLocal(Class<T> clazz)
        Deprecated. This functionality has moved to TaskContext.
        Grants access to task-specifics. For compatibility only. Please use TaskContext.require().getTaskSpecific(clazz) instead.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The compile-time type of the object to query.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class that serves as a key for the task specific.
        Returns:
        An object of type T or null if none was registered under the given key.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the current thread is not in a task context.

      • tryFindThreadGroupOfType

        public static <G> G tryFindThreadGroupOfType(ThreadGroup threadGroup,
                                             Class<G> groupClass)
        Searches the thread group hierarchy upward for the thread group of the specified type starting from the specified thread group.
        Type Parameters:
        G - the type of the thread group class
        Parameters:
        threadGroup - thread group from where the search should be started
        groupClass - class of the thread group to look for
        Returns:
        thread group assignable from the specified class or null if no group with specified parameters found

      • tryFindThreadGroupOfType

        public static <G> G tryFindThreadGroupOfType(Class<G> groupClass)
        Searches the thread group hierarchy upward for the thread group of the specified type starting from the thread group of the calling thread.
        Type Parameters:
        G - the type of the thread group class
        Parameters:
        groupClass - class of the thread group to look for
        Returns:
        thread group assignable from the specified class or null if no group with specified parameters found
